output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken and transferFrom functions allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, potentially leading to a tradeTrap issue.
buy function does not check return value of msg.sender.send(), allowing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
sell function does not check return value of msg.sender.send(), allowing a potential trap due to a potential integer overflow.
setPrices function allows owner to set sell and buy price to any value, potentially leading to a manipulation of the price arbitrarily.
